chat.settings.temperature.tip: Higher values make the model more creative and unpredictable, while lower values make it more deterministic and precise.
chat.settings.top_p.tip: Default value is 1, the smaller the value, the less variety in the answers, the easier to understand, the larger the value, the larger the range of the AI's vocabulary, the more diverse

error.chat.response: Something went wrong. Please check if you have set your API key in the Settings > Providers

http.400: Request failed. Please check if the request parameters are correct. If you have changed the model settings, please reset them to the default settings
http.401: Authentication failed. Please check if your API key is correct
http.403: Access denied. Please check if your account is verified, or contact the service provider for more information
http.404: Model not found or request path is incorrect
http.429: Too many requests. Please try again later
http.500: Server error. Please try again later
http.502: Gateway error. Please try again later
http.503: Service unavailable. Please try again later
http.504: Gateway timeout. Please try again later
